plot: A show about a brilliant female detective who solves crimes with a very unusual partner -- her ex-husband who's joined by his father and Police Commissioner Sheldon Bennett Sr., who remains close to his daughter-in-law despite the break up.   Written by  KristiAngusFan
title: A Screwball Homicide
plot_es: A show about a brilliant female detective who solves crimes with a very unusual partner -- her ex-husband who's joined by his father and Police Commissioner Sheldon Bennett Sr., who remains close to his daughter-in-law despite the break up.   Written by  KristiAngusFan
